title: Anthropic Funds AI Regulation, ByteDance Sparks Copyright Alarm, Meta Sells 7 Million Smart Glasses
description: Anthropic funds AI regulation push with $20M donation, ByteDance’s Seedance 2.0 sparks copyright debate, and Meta sells 7M AI smart glasses in 2025.

title: Pharma Rewires Drug Development With AI Operations
description: Drug development has grown too expensive and too slow to rely on manual workflows, as the cost of bringing a single therapy to market climbs into the billions and approval timelines stretch across a decade or more. In response, pharmaceutical companies are reshaping their operating models around artificial intelligence (AI). By embedding machine learning [...]The post Pharma Rewires Drug Development With AI Operations appeared first on PYMNTS.com.

title: TVA reverses coal plant closure plan as AI data centers drive electricity demand. Tennessee leaders weigh in
description: TVA reverses plans to close coal plants, keeping Cumberland City open as AI data centers drive record electricity demand. We asked Tenn. leaders if they should continue incentivizing data centers.

title: TestMu AI Honors Excellence in Quality Engineering with 2025 Partner Awards
description: TestMu AI, previously known as LambdaTest, celebrated outstanding contributions to the field of quality engineering by announcing the winners of its 2025 Partner of the Year Awards. The event underscores TestMu AI's commitment to recognizing excellence among its global partners and individual leaders who have pushed the boundaries of engineering quality in the AI era.
